com.facebook.litho.animation

Interface Resolver


  • public interface Resolver
    Class used to get and set the runtime values of mount contents in the component hierarchy during animations. All methods take a PropertyHandle which encapsulates a transitionKey used to reference the mount content and the AnimatedProperty on that mount content.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnimatedPropertyNode getAnimatedPropertyNode(PropertyHandle propertyHandle) 
      float getCurrentState(PropertyHandle propertyHandle) 

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentState

        float getCurrentState(PropertyHandle propertyHandle)
        Returns:
        the current value of this property before the next mount state is applied.

      • getAnimatedPropertyNode

        AnimatedPropertyNode getAnimatedPropertyNode(PropertyHandle propertyHandle)
        Returns:
        the AnimatedPropertyNode for this PropertyHandle. This gives animations the ability to hook this mount content property into the GraphBinding they create to drive their animation.
